question: Which 'literary' nickname has been given to the extinct species of man, discovered in Indonesia 2003, named Homo Floresiensis?
api_result: The extinct species Homo floresiensis, discovered in Indonesia in 2003, has been given the literary nickname "Hobbit." This nickname was inspired by the small-statured characters from J.R.R. Tolkien's "The Hobbit" and "The Lord of the Rings."
